content.raw:
The current plugin subscribes to [handle_msgs/HandleControl.msg](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/51d4095ddcdafe8e837e475c937e56d438521f46/handle_msgs/msg/HandleControl.msg?at=update_irobot_hand), you can trigger an action by:

~~~
rostopic pub -1 /left_hand/control handle_msgs/HandleControl '{type: [ 2, 2, 2, 2, 2 ] , value: [ 38000, 38000, 45000, 2000, 1500 ]}'
~~~

Above will try to control joint positions:
![hand position control](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/lgeewrkvl8hybvd/Screenshot%20from%202013-10-23%2019%3A08%3A23.png?dl=1)
content.html:
The current plugin subscribes to handle_msgs/HandleControl.msg, you can trigger an action by:

rostopic pub -1 /left_hand/control handle_msgs/HandleControl '{type: [ 2, 2, 2, 2, 2 ] , value: [ 38000, 38000, 45000, 2000, 1500 ]}'

Above will try to control joint positions:
